LanguageData.Aesthete.degreeDatas.0.label: aesthete
LanguageData.Aesthete.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves beautiful things, and really cares about how HIS enviroment looks。
LanguageData.Bipolar.degreeDatas.0.label: bipolar
LanguageData.Bipolar.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is prone to extreme mood swings. When HE's happy, HE can be very happy, but when HE's sad, HE can become dangerously depressed。
LanguageData.BrownThumb.degreeDatas.0.label: brown thumb
LanguageData.BrownThumb.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a terrible gardener. The only thing HE seems able to grow is weeds。
LanguageData.Butcher.degreeDatas.0.label: butcher
LanguageData.Butcher.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME enjoys preparing meat for cooking. HISCAP butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if HE's dealing with animal corpses. HECAP's terrible with mechanoids。
LanguageData.Chemist.degreeDatas.0.label: chemist
LanguageData.Chemist.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a knack for organic chemistry, and is quite an efficient worker when brewing or producing drugs。
LanguageData.Claustrophobic.degreeDatas.0.label: claustrophobic
LanguageData.Claustrophobic.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is claustrophobic. HECAP is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner。
LanguageData.ColdLover.degreeDatas.0.label: cold lover
LanguageData.ColdLover.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves colder temperatures. HECAP'll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot。
LanguageData.DeepSleeper.degreeDatas.0.label: deep sleeper
LanguageData.Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.label: gourmet
LanguageData.Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a passion for food preparation. HISCAP culinary creations are quite tasty, but HE tends to take a while getting them "just right."
LanguageData.GreenThumb.degreeDatas.0.label: green thumb
LanguageData.GreenThumb.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a passion for gardening. HECAP gets a mood bonus for every plant HE sows。
LanguageData.HeatLover.degreeDatas.0.label: heat lover
LanguageData.HeatLover.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves the heat. HECAP'll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold。
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.0.label: inept
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.0.description: HECAP means well, but NAME is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor。
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.1.label: coordinated
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor。
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.0.label: ironman
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. HE is unlikely to be immobilized by it。
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.1.label: tough
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has a high tolerance for pain。
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.2.label: low pain tolerance
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.2.description: NAME will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most。
LanguageData.Inventor.degreeDatas.0.label: inventor
LanguageData.Inventor.degreeDatas.0.description: Strange new ideas just appear in NAME's mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to HIM, but HE always seems distracted。
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.0.label: near-sighted
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a hard time seeing things clearly unless HE is relatively close to them。
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.1.label: eagle-eyed
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets。
LanguageData.NeatFreak.degreeDatas.0.label: neat freak
LanguageData.NeatFreak.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is fastidious to a fault。
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.0.label: nibbler
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME picks at HIS food, taking extra time to finish HIS meals。
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.1.label: glutton
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME devours HIS meals much faster than others。
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.0.label: nyctophobe
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is really afraid of the dark。
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.1.label: nyctophile
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME doesn't fear the dark at all。
LanguageData.Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.label: perfectionist
LanguageData.Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME refuses to accept less than HIS best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. HECAP's less likely to fail when doing something, but HE works slowly。
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.0.label: poor medic
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.0.description: Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. NAME is one of those people。
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.1.label: skilled medic
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in HIS care will likely fare well。
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.2.label: master medic
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.2.description: NAME has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between HIS steady, skilled hands and HIS inspiring bedside manner, patients in HIS care will have little to fear。
LanguageData.Rockhound.degreeDatas.0.label: rockhound
LanguageData.Rockhound.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME enjoys working with rocks. HISCAP mining speed is increased, but HIS lack of interest in other areas slows HIM down when doing other jobs. And HE hates working with plants。
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.0.label: sluggish
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is not very good at getting out of the way of blows。
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.1.label: swift reflexes
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks。
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.0.label: sucker
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. HECAP'll pay more than HE should, and still think that HE got a good deal.
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.1.label: haggler
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. HECAP tends to get better prices than most people。
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.2.label: master trader
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.2.description: NAME always gets the best deals。
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.0.label: careful shooter
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.0.descripti: NAME takes more time to aim when shooting. HECAP shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy。
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.1.label: trigger-happy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.1.descripti: Pew! Pew! Pew! NAME just likes pulling the trigger. HECAP shoots faster than others, but less accurately。
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.2.label: deadshot
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.2.descripti: NAME knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately。
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.0.label: uncouth
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.0.description: Subtlety? Diplomacy? NAME barely even understands the meaning of the words。
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.1.label: diplomat
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy。
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.2.label: master diplomat
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.2.description: NAME has such a way with words that HE always manages to cool down a tense situation. HECAP could talk for days and people would still listen。
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.0.label: weak constitution
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout。
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.1.label: strong constitution
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME's body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout。
